info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 12:57PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Mecklenburg and east central York Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 1257 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles northwest of Indian Land, or near Fort Mill, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Uptown Charlotte, Rock Hill, Central Charlotte, South Charlotte, East Charlotte, Matthews, Mint Hill and Fort Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
